general_advisory: Prepare the wet nursery seed beds for paddy. Using rainwater the nursery beds may puddle 2-3 times followed by planking. Apply fertilizers and maintain proper plant protection measures.

advisory: Nursery Management - Prepare the wet nursery seed beds for paddy.
Seed treatment - Treat the paddy seeds with Carbendazim or Thiram before sowing in the nursery.
Yellow mosaic virus - Control by spraying triazophos or Acetamipride.
Yellow mosaic virus - Control by spraying triazophos or Acetamipride.
Wilting - Spray Mancozeb if symptoms are noticed.
Fruit & Shoot borer - Install pheromone trap to monitor population.
To manage Alternaria - Spray Mancozeb or Carbendazim.
Aphids and Jassids infestation - Manage with Imidachloprid.
Remove wilted plants from the field.
Leaf eating caterpillar - Manage biologically with Pheromone trap or chemical control.
